title: Drawing, "International Casino: Miscellaneous Cabinets", July 28, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite at center right: MISC. CABINETS INTERNATIONAL CASINO.; inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions, materials throughout; inscribed in graphite in architect's stamp: 546-81; 1" - 1'-0"; INT. CASINO; DILLM./7.28.37; 1/28 2. EMPIRE/1 BRECKER; above stamp: NOTE: 1 - VERIFY ALL DIMENSIONS AT JOB/BEFORE PROCEEDING/2-SEE FLOOR PLANS FOR LOCATION/3- FINISH BLEACHED MAPLE/4- VENEER EDGES
description: Elevations for cabinets to be placed on first and second floors.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Miscellaneous Cabinets", July 28, 1937.
July 28, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-201.
